title: 44m2 flat, in the heart of Paris
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Available immediately
In a calm little street, in heart of X district. Metros: Poissonière / Gare du nord/ Gare de l 'Est. 
2 rooms apartment (44 m2 ). Furnished . On 2 levels. (Souplex). Nice American Kitchen and Italian bathroom .
1 double bed, and 1 sofa bed . 1150E /month (+ heater, water, electricity/ cable internet and taxe s= 50 E /month) Deposit one month
